answerText: The Dumbwaiter[10] This author of The Birthday Party and The Homecoming wrote The Dumbwaiter.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Virginia Commonwealth University  | 12 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: At one point an envelope full of matches slides under a door and the two characters argue about the proper terminology for lighting a kettle.  [10] Name this play in which Ben is supposed to shoot Gus.
